goodsInfoCard.title.helpThem: Help Dan and Wakana get rid of their stuff!
goodsInfoCard.body.description:
Wakana and Dan are moving to Canada in September and need to find good homes for their prized possessions. Book any items you are interested in, then we will contact you to arrange for pickup or delivery.

Most items can be picked up any time between now and September 10th. We will offer free delivery on any purchase over 1000 yen.

Free delivery can be scheduled either on Friday, September 10th (evening) or Saturday, September 11th (day/evening).
bookDialog.title.youAreAbout: You are about to book {{count}} item
bookDialog.title.youAreAbout_plural: You are about to book {{count}} items
bookDialog.desc.pleaseFilTheForm: Please fill the following form so we can contact you and arrange the remaining details.
bookDialog.fieldName.name: Name
bookDialog.placeholder.name: e.g.: Yamada Taro
bookDialog.notes.itMayTakeTime: * It may take us one or two days to contact you.
bookDialog.notes.weWillReactivateItems: * We will set the selected items as available again if we contact you and we receive no response for several days or you lose interest in the items.
bookDialog.message.itemsBooked: The selected items have been successfully reserved for you. We will contact you soon to arrange the details! Thanks.
